    private class GameMenu.CustomTextPane
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
    Private class to create multiple custom JTextPanes for the DashBoard.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomTextPane

        private CustomTextPane(java.lang.String text,
                       javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet textAlignment,
                       java.awt.Color background,
                       java.awt.Color foreground,
                       boolean border)
        CustomTextPane Constructor, read params for instructions.
        Parameters:
        text - - The Text in the text pane
        textAlignment - - The alignment of the text, if null, default used
        background - - Color of the back ground
        foreground - - Color of the foreground
        border - - If true: Add a matte border of foreground color, if false, no border
